members.name: MediaMetadata.title
members.description: Returns or sets the title of the media to be played.

members.name: MediaMetadata.artist
members.description: Returns or sets the name of the artist, group, creator, etc. of the media to be played.

members.name: MediaMetadata.album
members.description: Returns or sets the name of the album or collection containing the media to be played.

members.name: MediaMetadata.artwork
members.description: Returns or sets an array of images associated with playing media.Â
